column4: Weekend in Berlin Party Center - II

The space
Beautiful 20 sq.m. room in a 120 sq.m. shared apartment in the center of Berlin's alternative district - Wrangelkiez in Kreuzberg. 5 min walk from Metro U1 Schlesisches Tor. Live 10secs near one of the coolest parks - Görlitzer Park- 10min walk to 2 rivers that cross through the city. Lick your lips with diverse and delicious foods: authentic german, turkish, spanish, mexican, thai, vietnamese, indian foods- all on the same street. Berlin's hippest venues and clubs are at walking distance: Berghain, Club der Visionäre, Arena, Watergate - if getting sweaty in nightclubs is your thing. Or just relax at the sunny terraces of a hundred cafés in the area.
When you're ready for a nap, or some cool afternoon love, retreat to the bright and cosy room. Through the two large windows, which can be opened all the way, you have a view of one of Berlin's oldest churches which is a few meters from the sill of the window. The room and the whole flat are furnished and fully equipped with everything you need (large bed of 1,60m width, bath tub, kitchen appliances, phone, internet, washing machine, etc.). The flat is quite light & bright (third floor) but still cool in summer. I got a very nice & cool flatmate & also the neighbours are super nice! The big double bed is perfect for one or two people. And the room can potentially accomodate up to 3 or 4 people.

Falckensteinstr. itself has several clubs, many bars & restaurants, shops, ... On the one end of the street is Görlitzer park, on the other end is Oberbaumbrücke across the river Spree. Within walking distance about half of Berlin's nightlife is located - where you can party hard and long!

Great location: situated in the most hip area in Berlin surrounded by nice Restaurants and cafes.

CENTRAL PRENZLAUERBERG
This is Berlin’s über-trendy district, a favourite with young crowds and artsy types who frequent its terrace cafés, kitsch boutiques and alternative-style bars around Kollwitzplatz, or the Kulturbrauerei, an old brewery with shops and nightlife. Excellent public transport connections take you into Mitte in about 10 minutes, where you can visit main Berlin attractions such as Alexanderplatz, Museum Island or Hackescher Markt.

Prenzlauer Berg was the first neighborhood in former East Berlin in which the wall came down, so there is a memorial park & a Museum to the Berlin Wall nearby. It is also the closest residential neighborhood to Mitte, the center of the city where you find many Monuments, Museums, and Tourist sites.

Herrlich ruhige und grüne Lage mit frischer Luft und freundlicher Nachbarschaft. Viel gesehen, gut geschlafen, die Morgensonne auf der Terrasse genießen, Sonne im Herzen: Wer das sucht, ist hier richtig! Schnelles WLAN, ½ h vom Brandenburger Tor.

The space
Ihr seid in Berlin zu einem tollen Workshop, macht bei einem Yoga-Event mit, wart beim Rock-Konzert oder sonstwas. Nun stellt sich die Frage: Wo könnt Ihr preiswert schlafen? Eigentlich würdet Ihr gern auch die Stunden danach oder dazwischen in der Gruppe zusammen bleiben. Wie wäre es da mit einem Frühstück in der Morgensonne, vielleicht sogar im Garten. Also, ich biete Euch einen Schlafsaal unter dem Dach und einen im Souterrain. Ihr könnt auch im Garten ein Zelt unter Obstbäumen aufbauen. Es gibt im Haus drei WCs, zwei davon mit Dusche.
Und nun weitere Preise:

8 € pro Frühstück oder kaltem Abendbrot (Kinder bis 12 Jahre 5€)
10 € pro warmes Abendbrot (Kinder bis 12 Jahre 6€)

Very lively, central and safe neighborhood. There is an ecological farmers' market twice a week in the square and plenty of restaurants, cafes, shops and other amenities such as cinema, theatres, etc in the area.

There are bus, underground and tram at five minutes walking distance from the house. Many of the attractions of Berlin are, in any case, at walking distance from the apartment. There are also two shops to rent bicycles in the surroundings.

The apartment offers an exceptional base for those interested in discovering Berlin. It is a little jewel in the city so please abstain those who come to the city "to party".

Die 45 m² große gemütliche Altbauwohnung liegt im Hinterhaus und verfügt über zwei helle Zimmer. Sie wurde hochwertig und liebevoll möbliert und hinterlässt keine offenen Wünsche. Durch den langen Flur sind Schlaf- und Wohnzimmer, sowie das Bad zu erreichen. Das große Schlafzimmer bietet, ausgestattet mit einem Doppelbett und einer Kommode alles was zum Entspannen notwendig ist. Das moderne Vollbad bietet im Verhältnis zur Größe der Wohnung genügend Platz zur Pflege und Erholung in der Badewanne. Das große Wohnzimmer ist sehr offen und hell gestaltet und lädt dazu ein sich auch zu Hause wohl zu fühlen. Über das Wohnzimmer ist die offene Küche zu erreichen. Dort finden sich alle notwendigen Küchengeräte, sowie ein Tisch mit Stühlen. Zudem ist praktisch, dass in der Küche Fenster sind, die während des Kochens geöffnet werden können um Gerüche durch frische Luft auszugleichen.

Berlin Neukölln is colorful. The Richard district itself is part of Rixdorf a former small village , which was gradually absorbed by the growing city of Berlin. The tiny lovely spot called Rixdorf is now trapped between Sonnenallee and Karl Marx Str.
Everything here is within walking distance. Whether you feel like listening to an opera , swimming or going on the roof-top of the Klunkerkranich. Bars invite you to linger. There are plenty of culinary delights and lot's of green.

Located in the UNESCO World Heritage Hufeisensiedlung (Horseshoe Estate) by famous architect Bruno Taut. Rentable house of the 1920s with garden for design lovers: restored true to the original, frequently awarded and mentioned in press and media.

The space
Suitable for up to four guests, "Taut’s Home" is a real-life experience of design history with the character of a museum.

For outstanding contributions and excellence in monument preservation Taut's Home received the "European Union Prize for Cultural Heritage / Europa Nostra Award 2013", which is considered as the "Oscar" for monument preservation.

The house is located in the famous "Horseshoe Estate" designed by Bruno Taut in 1925-30 - probably the most outstanding example of innovative German town planning. In 2008 the estate in the south of vibrant Berlin was awarded UNESCO World Heritage status.

The design apartment is located in the district of Friedrichshain, in the impressive buildings of the former "Stalin Avenue". The street and the houses were built during the 1950s as a monumental socialist boulevard for East Berlin. Today it's the longest monument of the German Capital and is considered to be one of the most exciting spots of the city for architecture enthusiasts.

Enjoy the modern and comfortable atmosphere in this urban design apartment which was completely refurbished beginning of 2013 offering everything you need for a great stay in Berlin.

A bakery, Aldi and several restaurants are around the corner.
<

The space
The apartment is done as an art project together with an architect and was awarded by the Architecture Prize Berlin 2013 because of its experimental use of space.

The space creates new perspectives of living spaces and is a amazing experience on its own, together with all that Berlin has to offer. The comfortably furnished apartment with balcony in south-west orientation is 80 square meters and is located on the 6th floor. A large elevator is available. The quiet apartment offers up to 5 people (6 people including cot) enough space.

There are a total of 5 comfortable sleeping places available (4 x bed + 1 x sofa bed).

Our aim is to make your visit to Berlin as pleasant as possible. Therefore, we have fully equipped the apartments with great attention to detail. They each have a Sony LED flat screen TV, a radio / CD player, a free Wi-Fi connection, a washing machine, a kitchenette with hob, oven, dishwasher, microwave, toaster, coffee maker, kettle.

The apartment was renovated in the spring of 2015 and has under these measures u.a. got a new bath.

The kitchen is big enough for dinning, in the bathroom is a bathtub and a washing machine.

I only take bookings up to two months before your arrival, meaning you can book from 2-60 days before you get here :)

I live in a lovely old two-room apartment in south Kreuzberg, very close to Bergmannstrasse. Its a 10 minute walk from the Jewish Museum, 10 minutes by train to Brandenburger Tor and Friedrichstrasse. Theres four subway lines crossing within a 5-minute walk (Mehringdamm, Mockernbrucke, Hallesches Tor), so its extremely central.

The apartment consists of two rooms, with one soft visco-foam double bed+one extra mattress to be put on the floor, large dining table, a kitchen with everything you need for cooking and a bathroom. The windows face the eastern part of Berlin, giving you a decent skyline.

This is an old apartment you are renting, so don't expect a hotel experience where everything is newly renovated.

Guest access
Due to Berlin's new rental laws part of the apartment is partitioned off.

Big and well-equipped kitchen with induction-cooker, dishwasher, Senseo-Coffee-machine, microwave, washing machine and dryer, bathtub, 3m ceiling hight, LCD-TV, for 4 persons. (additional booking: underground parking place).

Welcome in our new apartment in the middle of Berlin!

65 sqm apartment in the heart of Friedrichshain, near Volkspark Friedrichshain, ideally located.

The lounge and the kitchen give onto a typically Berlin inner courtyard (a small sandbox, bikes and plants!).
Rooms give onto a small ideal own garden to eat outside.

The apartment can welcome up to 7 persons.
It contains an entrance, a big room with a double bed, a small room with 2 bunk beds and a bed drawer, giving both onto the garden.
The lounge-dining room and the kitchen give onto the inner courtyard. There is a sofa bed for two people in the lounge.

Here you find many cafes, bars, shops and restaurants just when you walk out the door. Just around the corner is the huge Mauerpark, internationally known for the sunday flea market.
It´s a great area with very good traffic connections. A tram nearby the house brings you to Rosenthaler Platz and Hackescher Markt in just few minutes. Few minutes on the Ubahn and you will arrive at Alexanderplatz and be in within walking distance of the Museum Island and Brandenburg Gate.

The apartment offers 2 bedrooms with a comfortable king size bed each. The open kitchen and the big living room make this flat an ideal base for up to 4 people who are looking to enjoy everything that Berlin is famous for.

My guests are welcome to feel at home and enjoy the comfort of wifi, a washing machine and a dishwasher. I do not have a tv set, but you are welcome to use the WiFi.

The position of my flat is awesome: You’re in Mitte when you walk 500 m (1600 ft) south and in Friedrichshain when you walk 500 m east. The space
We open our beautiful apartment and home to guests whenever we are out of town (next available dates: July 24-Aug 8, please only write if you're interested in the full two weeks, thank you :). We've hosted people from all over the world and it's been a great experience!

The apartment is a typical turn-of-the-century 'Altbau' with charming wooden floors, high ceilings and large windows! It consists of three large and bright rooms, a cozy and fully equipped (dishwasher etc) eat-in kitchen with a wooden table and a kitchen bench by the window. In addition, our 'library' with tons of Germany and English books is the heart peace of the apartment and a perfect place to lounge on the carpet,

The Downtown Landmark near Checkpoint Charlie.
A HOLIDAY HOME IN A NEW over 120 YEARS OLD CENTRAL MONUMENT !
The only place that 100 percent survived the 2nd world war in this central area, with a preserved history.
BEST LOCATION (city center near Checkpoint Charlie, most famous sights can be reached by foot), MOST BEAUTIFUL HOUSE OF THE AREA in the legendary street Friedrichstrasse, TOP CONDITION, QUIET (no drive through, pedestrian zone starts 200 meters away).

The space
MAGICIANS, THE GREENS, BANKERS, LAWYERS AND FILMMAKERS

Important information about the current legal situation in Berlin:
Renting private housing to tourists has been prohibited in Berlin since 2017. (Misuse regulation). However, renting holiday apartments that are registered as a business is not prohibited as long as you meet the conditions and pay the corresponding taxes.

column4: cozy flat, industry design, suitable for families+
column5:
Warum ein einfaches Hotel mieten, wenn du eine stylische 105m² Wohnung dein Eigen nennen kannst.

Why you try to book a expensive Hotel, if you can stay in a stylish 105m² apartment.

The space
Du lebst in einem ehemaligen Ladengeschäft, 105m² Altbau, 2 große Zimmer mit 4m hohen Wänden mit originalen Stuck. 25m² großes Wohnzimmer mit allen technischen Know How, Bibliothek und Möbeln von Charles Eames, Bo concept und originalen Industrie Design. 25m² Schlafzimmer mit bequemen 140cm Bett und einem Kinderbett bei Bedarf. Ein 16m² großes Bad mit Dusche und Wanne und einer Relax-Ecke zum entspannen. Die Küche ist komplett ausgestattet und hat eine gemütliche Sitzecke.

You stay in a previous retail store and Kindergarten, 105 m² apartment in 150 years old listed building. It has 2 large rooms of the same size with 4 m high ceilings with original stucco. The 25 m² large living room is equipped with the necessary stuff like 55inch flatscreen, stereo

Welcome to the heart of Berlin: Friedrichshain.
Enjoy this warm, spacious and beautifully renovated Flat which is surrounded by countless boutique stores, wonderful restaurants and bars. Located 50m from Boxhagener Platz with great public transport access.

Berliner Registrierungsnummer: 02/Z/RA/008688-18

The space
The apartment is a typical for days gone past. Enjoy huge ceilings, open space and wooden floors throughout. A beautiful, large bed awaits making you feel right at home.

Its ideal for 2 people but the Sofa works as a very comfortable bed as well should there be 3 of you.

License number
02/Z/RA/008688-18

This beautiful apartment is located in the attic of our house with separate access. Parking is free in front of the house. Bus and S-Bahn connection in the immediate vicinity.

The space
This designed apartment is located in Zehlendorf, with private entrance. So, the guests without errors can come and go.
A fully equipped kitchen with oven, ceramic hob, coffee machine, kettle, toaster and dishwasher as well as bed linen, and hairdryer are included of course. In addition, the two sofa beds in the living room for additional guests are available.
The apartment is facing the garden.
The minimum rental period is 4 nights. Discrepancies please me contact!

Guest access
Separate entrance via a large spiral staircase on the side of the House.
Free Wifi use
Please not smoking in the rooms!
Smoking only outside!

Other things to note
Our House is located in the beautiful district of Zehlendorf, with

very central Kreuzberg location.
1 minute to public transportation
1 minute to shopping etc.
Many restaurants, cafes, clubs close by.

The space
What you see is what you get.
modern bathroom with shower,
seating area in kitchen,
kitchen is equipped with dual cooking plate, microwave, toaster, watercooker, fridge.
Coffee and coffeemakers for you to use.
An additional folding bed can be set up on request.

Guest access
full access

Other things to note
1 month stays are possible, please contact me with your request before booking.

Apartment no. 1384
short description
3-rooms apartment / 117 m² / max. 8 persons / 4. floor / 4 double beds

The space
FEWO 1384 the apartment is in the neighborhood Mitte of Berlin. The best apartment to discover Berlin. FEWO 1384 Ideal to relax away from the busy center. A surface of 117 m2 will allow you to be comfortable, feel free, regardless on how many people you are. Do you have to work during your vacations? Or do you just want to be always connected? Whatever the reason is, we offer internet connection. Big tiled open kitchen, laminate floor, big living room/ dining room with double sofa beds. Bathtub with shower, separate WC, a bedroom with double bed, a spacious bedroom with double bed and double sofa bed. TV set, stereo and DVD, balcony, bed linen, towels

Other things to note
-City tax: yes, with extra cost 5% pay at arrival in cash

License number
1/Z/NA 004856-16

20m2 room: bed for 2 plus air mattress for one more person, very luminous close to U7/Karl-Marx-Str. and U8/Leinestr. a lot of bars coffees and supermarkets in the neighborhood!

The space
Spacious bedroom in a shared flat (queer WG), we have an eat-in kitchen, with everything you need for cooking, and a bathroom with a bathtub. There is also a washing machine and drying rack if you need to do laundry.

The flat is in a perfect location for exploring Neukölln, just a few minutes walk from templehof park and the neighborhood is full of independently owned bars and restaurants.

column4: Cozy 2 room apartment in a beautiful leafy area
column5:
This cozy apartment is perfect for a good rest after a long noisy tourist day. The best place to stay for nice and quiet people.

The residential area is very green, quiet and beautiful.

Get to Friedrichshain in 15 mins by the direct tram!

The space
- a green area (a huge park is literally around the corner)

- 100 % safe place (only nice people live around here)

- close to the beach (in summer you can go to the pool or a lake )

- direct tram to Friedrichshain in 15 mins (Boxhagener Platz flea market, O2 Arena, East Side Gallery, Oberbaum Bridge yes that's all there)

- get to the Tourist City Center in about 40 mins by the public transport

- Close to the biggest Berlin lake Müggelsee

- The biggest european Zoo (Tierpark) is in 10 mins to access

Guest access
- Kitchen (you are welcomed to store your food in the fridge and cook)
- Bathroom (soap

Wohnung in bester Lage der City West in der Bleibtreustraße am Savignyplatz. Restaurants, Cafés, Kino, ein Spielplatz und der Kurfürtstendamm in unmittelbarer Nähe.

The space
Die Wohnung (ca. 85 m²) liegt ruhig in der 3. Etage des Seitenflügels (ohne Aufzug) eines Gründerzeithauses und hat 3 helle Zimmer sowie eine ehemalige "Mädchenkammer" als Schlaf- und Spielmöglichkeit, ideal für Kinder.
Die Wohnung hat ein großes Schlafzimmer (ca. 20 m²) mit Doppelbett (160x200), ein kleines Schlafzimmer (ca. 10 m²) mit Einzelbett (90x200) und die Kammer mit Doppelbett (140x200). Sie liegt oberhalb des Badezimmers und ist über eine Treppe erreichbar (Deckenhöhe ca. 175 cm). Das Wohnzimmer ist etwa 25 m² groß. Die Wohnung ist perfekt für 4 Personen, bei 6 Personen steht noch eine komfortable Matratze zur Verfügung.

Guest access
WLAN

Other things to note
Hinter dem Haus ist eine Schule, da kann es in den Hofpausen wochentags a

This great apartment is 80 square meters and has 2 bedrooms, a large bright living room, a hallway, a modern fitted bathroom and a fully equipped kitchen. It is located in the heart of Friedrichshain with lots of lovely cafés and shops nearby.

The space
There is flatscreen TV, stereo and wifi, everything is free. One bedroom has exit to the balcony, from which one has a good view of Simon-Dach-Straße . On the balcony there is a small garden table and 4 chairs so you can sit outside in good weather. Overall, the apartment is bright and comfortable , tastefully furnished and decorated. The building has an elevator which can be used. The apartment is located on the first floor. The apartment has 4 beds and a cot . In addition, there is a mattress , and the apartment can be rented by agreement to up to 6 people.

License number
02/Z/RA/012078-20

Located in the heart of beautiful Charlottenburg, West Berlin, this charming two-room apartment contains a lovely fully equipped kitchen & bathroom. 2 TVs and free wifi access.
5% city tax will be collected in cash upon arrival.
Arr. 14:00-21:00 Dep. by 11:00
Arr. 21:00-23:00 add 30.-€
Arr. 23:00-08:00 add 50.-€

Warning: According to the law in Berlin, it is forbidden to download movies or audio files on the Internet. The violator is expected to face heavy fines. you have been warned

License number
04/Z/ZA/005477-17

My apartment21 is located in the center of Berlin. Between 2 subway stations that take you to any place in the city. Quietly located in one of the smallest streets in Berlin with a view of trees right in front of the main door and the wild garden in the backyard. You are not far away from the cool bars, cafes, restaurants and the shopping malls of the city, or just cook in the apartment, together with your family or friends.

The space
+++ COVID-19 Update: For Your and my protection I disinfect the apartment before every visit according to the recommendations of the Robert Koch Institute (German Pandemic Institute) +++ The cleaning protocol is available for your information so that you also know what was disinfected and how it was cleaned. Disinfectants are available for your stay.

For the right mix and a great living feeling, I have furnished the apartment with contemporary furniture and design classics. In all rooms, you will find art originals by B

column4: Legal Flat for 7! 2,5Bath &Self ChekIn directly U5
column5:
Legal Apartment
Short distances: The Ring Center with over 100 shops is only a 5-minute drive away, supermarket, bakery, medical care, restaurants, snack bars and the Stasi Museum can be reached in a few minutes on foot.
From Magdalenstraße underground station (two minutes on foot from the apartment), Alexanderplatz is about 15 minutes away,

The space
The apartment is 100 square meters
You are just a stone's throw from the Stasi Museum.

Room 1
Double bed 180x200
Singel bed 90x200
Sofa bed and 3 armchairs to relax watching TV.
Dining table and chairs. Wardrobe.

Room 2
Double bed 180x200
Single bed 90x200
wardrobe

Bathroom 1
Sink and a shower and toilet

Bathroom 2
Toilet and shower

Guest toilet
Toilet and sink

Bed linen is provided along with towels.
There is an ironing board and iron.
A hairdryer is also available.

A beautiful spacious light-flooded home in the center of west Berlin with high-end amenities. Perfect location to explore the city for families, friends, couples, and people who do creative work from home. Right by major transportation hub, excellent restaurants, cafes and galleries.

The space
Newly renovated Jugendstil apartment typical of Berlin, with 4 meter (13 ft)-high Stuck ceilings, a huge open state-of-the-art kitchen and dining room, three bedrooms with high-quality mattresses and linens. A fancy walk-in rainforest shower, large sunny living room with a massive cozy (sleepable) couch, ceiling-high windows and a balcony, high speed Internet, two work spaces. Eclectic furniture some of it antique, some of it new, some of it made by us (artist and writer). 1.5 bathrooms. Lots of character. Elevator access. Exposed brick. 150 m2.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire apartment. We provide two sets of keys to the apartment,

Willkommen in Berlin.
In unmittelbarer Nachbarschaft zum Schloss Charlottenburg, verkehrsgünstig und naturnah gelegen, bietet das frisch renovierte Apartment die besten Voraussetzungen für entspannte Tage in unserer Stadt.

column4: 4-room, open and light filled loft like apartment
column5:
The space
It is a beautiful old building, but totally renovated, in the heart of Berlin ( 200m from Rosenthaler Platz , opposite the Weinberg Park ) . The apartment is very open (loft style) and has two separate lockable bedrooms, the other two sleeping palces are in the living room . All three sleeping rooms are in separate rooms and distinguished from each other.

Guest access
The key for the front building and the the apartment will be either be deposited at a small store nearby or handed over personally.

Other things to note
It is not a party apartment . Only reputable and caring guests .

Unsere Wohnung liegt im grünen Berlin- Zehlendorf. Die überwiegende Mehrheit unserer Gäste fühlen sich bei uns, wie man in Berlin sagt, "Pudelwohl" und kommen gerne in unsere familiere Umgebung zurück.

The space
Unsere Wohnung ist in einem Einfamilienhaus , ruhige Lage , im grünen Zehlendorf. Sie liegt im 1. Stock und hat 2 Zimmer - Küche - Bad. Im Garten haben wir eine Sitzecke für Gäste wo auch gegrillt werden kann. Im Wohnbereich befindet sich ein kostenloser Möbelsafe.

Guest access
Wir bieten freies WLAN und haben eine kostenlosen Parkplatz auf unserem Grundstück.

Other things to note
Sollten Sie mit einem Haustier anreisen bitten wir um Information. Es entstehen dann zusätzliche Kosten von 20 €- 30 €

Bitte beachten !
Seit 2014 muß in Berlin eine Übernachtungssteuer von 5 % gezahlt werden. Diese ist vom Gast bei Anreise an den Vermieter zu entrichten und ist nicht im Übernachtungspreis enthalten.

Eine wunderschöne Künstlerwohnung wartet auf angenehme und kultivierte Gäste. Platz bis vier Personen, südwest Lage, ruhig, Balkon, Küche. Die gesamte Wohnung hat drei Zimmer. Sie wohnen mitten in West-Berlin, unweit vom Kurfürstendamm. Die U-Bahn und sämtliche Busverbindungen sind nur zwei Fußminuten entfernt. Die Wohnung ist in einer ruhigen Seitenstrasse, lichtdurchflutet selbst im Winter. Hier können Sie genießen, sich der Kultur einer Weltstadt erfreuen.

The space
Diese Wohnung ist ausgestattet mit Liebe zu jedem Detail. An den Wänden hängen Unikate der Künstlerin die auch gerne Ihre Gastgeberin ist.

Guest access
Auf jeglichen Komfort den meine Wohnung zu bieten hat.

Other things to note
Stadtführungen nach Absprache. Organisation jederzeit für den Gast möglich. Fahrradvermietung ganz in der Nähe
Feiern/ Partys in der Wohnung sind nicht erlaubt
Rauchen in der Wohnung unerwünscht, jedoch gibt es einen B

Central city west, 2 metros 5 min., walking distance to Zoo, Kudamm, KaDeWe (10 min.), art deco house, balcony, 2 rooms, 1 kitchen, 1 bathroom, big windows, precious apartment.

The space
Sunny, full of light, very high ceilings, plaster in the living room and sleeping room.

Other things to note
I expect the guests to leave the apartment as clean as you find it, I dont charge cleaning costs extra.
Please if you leave, take off all the stuff from the fridge, bring back returnable bottles and bring the garbage to the garbage bins in the courtyard. Please seperate garbage. There are seperated dumpsters for packaging (green dot), white and green or brown glass, papers or cardboard and biological waste.

License number
Str 133/33874/11822

Minimal and luminous brand-new Loft situated heart of the trendy area of Neukölln, next to the park Tempelhofer Feld. The room is ideal for a couple who wants to enjoy the charm of Berlin in a modern atmosphere of a contemporary Loft.

The space
It’s in the middle of the new trendy and lively area of Neukölln, that the spacious Loft is located. Once upstairs ( the apartment is on the 5th floor) you can enjoy from the terrace the view and the calm that Berlin’s roofs give.
The really luminous Loft is completely new, the construction work has been ended in January 2015.
The loft has only two closed rooms: the bathroom and the guest bedroom, the rest of the apartment is open-door.
The kitchen is brand-new and offers an gas cooktop, toaster, fridge, freezer, water heater and dish washer.
The dining area is in front of the big plate glass window overlooking the terrace.
The bathroom offers a bathtub and a spacious shower with rain shower a

I am advertising a large bedroom that can easily accommodate 2 people and a baby / kid. We will be sharing the flat

Flat is located in Wedding, which is super close to Tegel airport and on the S-Bahn and U-Bahn.
Very simple to connect to anywhere in town !

The space
The flat is super big (93sqm), all equiped
It is very calm, on the 5th floor and has a large south facing balcony overlooking the roofs. Ideal for sunny lazy moments ;)

Guest access
All access

This is a separate flat in our house with separate entrance - a complete 2-room-flat all for you alone. One shower with toilet, kitchenette and 2 sleepingrooms, 1 room is also livingroom. Huge wardrobe, fridge, oven etc.

1 Room 16qm
2 Room 36 qm

We are happy to welcome you in this fantastic city. Hope to see you soon, Nicole

The space
Our house is very close to the Messe Berlin by bus or even in walking distance (approx. 15 min.) With a rent-a-bike even shorter.
This is the lovely and historically very interesting district "Grunewald", famous for nice villas.

Guest access
You get your own key so you can come and go as you like.

Other things to note
Sorry, not barrier-free.

PLEASE READ:
The transport of wastewater is carried out via a pumping system that is driven by compressed air (airlift pump). So please do not throw anything into the toilet (e.g. tampons, pantry slips

1 bedroom, 1 office w 2person sofa bed, 1 living room w large sofa, small kirchen, bathroom, conservatory wi small table and 2 chairs.
No dining table!
75 m^2 in total.
Apartments is near city center: 30 minutes to both airports, 15 minutes walk to Mauerpark, public transport (subway) 3 minutes walk. 15 minutes ride to Brandenburger Tor.
NO SMOKING!
Usually my cat lives here but it is now abroad.

(Registration at the city authority is pending | Registrierung bei der Stadt ausstehend)

Other things to note
No smoking in the house!
Please take of all sheets and covers off the beds and throw them into the bathtub.

This is a beautiful spacious room with a balcony you can relax on in the centre of berlin.

The space
English version below//

Das Zimmer ist gross, hell und schön mit Sofa und Esstisch und einem wunderschönem Balkon eingerichtet. Du teilst Dir die Wohnung für den Zeitraum mit einem super angenehmen Mitbewohner. Das zimmer liegt im Prenzlauer Berg und zu den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln ist es nicht weit. U2/U8/U9 und verschiedene Trams sind nicht weit um die vielen Möglichkeiten, die Berlin bietet, schnell zu erreichen. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten sind ebenso gleich ums Eck, also perfekt für einen Aufenthalt in Berlin.

Die Wohnung verfügt ebenso über eine geräumige Küche, in der man wunderbar sich selbst versorgen und bekochen kann. Kühlschrank und Waschmaschine können gerne benutzt werden.

Das Bad hat sogar auch eine Badewanne, in der man auch gerne mal entspannen kann.

Also: kommt herein ins Heim einer geborenen Berlinerin!<

column4: A refuge of love in Berlin
column5:
This apartment is unique. Furnished with love and attention to detail, you will find yourself taken back to another time. The apartment consists of 2 rooms (bed-sit room, kitchen living).

The space
This apartment is looking for the same. Lovingly and in detail you will feel set back to another time. The refuge consists of 2 rooms (living room, kitchen) separated by a curtain. The refuge is located on the ground floor.
It is suitable for 3 persons (double bed 1.40 m, single bed 1.00 m). The kitchen is fully equipped with 2 hot plates, dishwasher, refrigerator. The bathroom has a shower.

Other things to note
- Bed linen and towels: 6 € / person
- Citytax Berlin (visitor's tax): 15 € flat rate

This lovely refurbished 2 bedroom apartment is on the raised ground floor of a 1930s block in the very heart of Berlin, close to the famous Ku'damm and Metro entrance. The apartment has two bedrooms, plus sofabed in the separate living room.

The space
The aparment, despite its very central urban location, is still surprisingly quiet and peaceful, with a pretty back yard, where bikes can be stored. It's equipped as a 'home from home' as my family also like to spend our holidays there.

Guest access
This apartment is on the raised ground floor, which is very handy if you are arriving with suitcases, buggies, or for those with mobilitiy problems.

Other things to note
GUESTS WILL BE REQUIRED TO AGREE OUR TERMS AND CONDITIONS (see summary in House Rules).
Why no reviews yet? We have only just joined Airbnb. But we have always got great reviews when we have rented in the past and hope you will be the first to review u

This is the apartment my family uses when we are staying in Berlin, 4 or 5 times a year. It is a bright 1000 square foot apartment in the third floor of a residential building from the 1920s, overlooking the beautiful Boxhagener Platz. It has two large bedrooms, a spacious sit-in-kitchen and a balcony for smokers. Located in an excellent neighborhood with plenty of cafés and restaurants, the apartment is very well connected to the rest of the city by underground and bus.

The space
Bright, spacious and well equipped, this place is perfect either for large or small families. Being a residential building, please take into account before booking that no noise or loud music are allowed.
The apartment has one large bedroom (33 square meters) with a double bed, a sofa, a desk and a balcony with views over the Boxhagener Square. Another bedroom (25 square meters) with two individual beds, each of them with a trundle bed that can be wheeled out when necessary. And a

This silent, spatious apartment in Mitte- Moabit, is situated 6 min. by bus from the central station. Furnished with design furniture in real oak, vintage lamps and decorated with luxurious Italian tiles, such "Bisazza" glass mosaic, and chandeliers.

The space
The location: the "Stephan Kiez", one of Berlin's and Mitte's best kept secrets, just 6 minutes by bus away from the central station. The street where the apartment is located, the Stephanstrasse, shows some of the best preserved facades of turn-of-the-century buildings in the whole city. From here every thing is at reach: The west center, Zoologischer garten, can be reached with three subway station. Tiergarten and its Siegesäule: 10 minutes by bike. The trendy neighbourhoods of the East, such as Prenzlauer Berg: 15 min by public transportation. And for those who come by car the good news: parking is FREE in this area, differently of most other central districts.

The apartment has been complet

In Mitte, 5 min walk to Alexanderplatz and nice view of the TV tower! The beautiful big room comes with one big queen sized bed and one person bed.
Feel free to contact! :)

The space
The place is very central. The most famous attractions and nice places are in the neighbourhood. Also you can reach everything very easily by public transport from Alexanderplatz. The room can host up to 3 people. Kitchen and bathroom will be shared with me.

Guest access
You can access the kitchen and bathroom of course. Also you can use everything whats in there, for example to make an espresso or having a shower :)

Nice Room in Schöneberg/Nollendorfplatz

The space
Our lovley flat is placed closed to the nollendorfplatz where you have metro supermarkets and nice cafes almost next door. Please notice that it is a shared living. We are three people sharing the flat with you. The room is 22 square meters big. The area is very friendly and quite beautiful. Every wednesday and every saturday there is a wonderful market at the winterfeldplatz wich is very nice to visit.
We like to welcome you in Berlin and in our flat.
Contact us.

Unsere Wohnung ist fast direkt am Nollendorfplatz in der gemütlichen und belebten Motzstrasse. U Bahnen fahren von hier in alle Richtungen Berlins und dazu gibt es auch noch viele Busse. Die Verbindungen könnten kaum besser sein. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten und nette Cafés sind auch so gut wie vor der Haustür.

Guest access
Metro, lots of nice cafes, supermarkets, and some spätis (shops 24/7)

We are a friendly, outgoing, couple who love traveling, world music, art and food. I am a designer from Australia living in Berlin 8 years, my partner is a teacher from Portugal.

The space
The space is very unique located on the top floor in the heart of the best neighborhood in kreuzberg.
Our apartment is a large loft style with separate living, kitchen, bedroom and bathroom. It's very warm and cozy at 68 square meters with a double bed, pillows, blankets and towels. Super quiet located in the back house off the street for some rest and recovery from your big adventures days or nights in Berlin. The Bathroom has been recently renovated with all brand new fittings. The kitchen is also newly renovated and comes fully equipped.
It's totally set up as your home away from home.

Guest access
The whole apartment besides one very small backroom.

Other things to note
It's a 2 min walk to bars, restaurants cafes a

column4: Central, charming, quiet, bright flat with 4 Rooms
column5:
This charming and bright 120 square meter flat with 4 rooms is located on the 4th floor (without elevator) of a classical Berlin building and can accommodate 4-5 people.

There is a large dining room with 6 chairs, a big sunny sleeping room with a 180*200 m bed and an additional nice bed for a guest a a large wardrobe and another second sleeping room which has 3 possibilities to sleep.
The flat has a fully equipped kitchen with dish washer, a large bathroom a washing machine.

The space
This charming and bright 120 square meter flat with 4 rooms is located on the 4th floor (without elevator) of a classical Berlin building and can accommodate 4-5 people.
The flat is also perfect for a family with two children, who are also welcome to the neighbors.

The comfortable living room has a cable TV and a comfortable sofa also converts to a double bed (1,60 m x 2,00 m).

The large dining room with 6 chairs, from which lacks even t

column4: Beautiful, calm appartment close to Hermannplatz
column5:
The beautiful 53qm two room appartment is very close to Hermannplatz, the neighborhood in between Kreuzberg and Neukolln. Calm, because its in the backyard house.
There is a double bed in the bedroom and a sleeper sofa for two people in the living room. All rooms have wooden floors, high ceilings and big windows. The kitchen is big enough to sit and chill. To enter the shower, you have to go trough kitchen and the wc is separated (please see pics).
Very close to the tube station (u7 and u8).

The space
Close to Hermannplatz, the neighborhood in between Kreuzberg and Neukolln.

Fresh fruit & vegetable market on Hermannplatz.

Close to two metro station (u7 and u8) connect you directly to Mitte in 10 minutes or Schöneberg and Charlotenburg.

Surrounded by nice bars and cafes.

The apartment has a kitchen, living room and a bedroom, wooden floors, high ceilings and big windows. To enter the shower, you have to go trou

Best public transport connection. But i do offer 2 bikes (plz ask!). Trendy markets, parks, cafés, bars are in walking distance.
The 100y-old flat is comfy, modernized & includes everything you need for daily living and feeling like a real Berliner.

The space
The apartment is on the first floor in the back-house with large bright windows facing a wooded yard. It's calm and you can't hear any street noises. Besides the original hardwood floors - which are painted white in the main bedroom - and high ceilings, the flat features a fully outfitted eat-in kitchen and small bathroom. The room has a one big bedroom with a nice desk to work on and a queen size bed. The interior and decor combine a mix of carefully selected designer and vintage pieces.

Die Wohnung liegt in perfekter Ausgangslage um Berlin und Umgebung zu erkunden.
Die Orangerie und das Schloss Charlottenburg sind nur 5 Minuten entfernt. Die Messe Berlin erreicht man mit der S-Bahn in 15 Minuten. 2 Minuten fußläufig zu vielen Sehenswürdigkeiten und zu S-Bahn und Busverbindungen die sie zu Ihren Wunschorten in Berlin und Umland bringt. Ob geschäftlich oder privat ein idealer Startpunkt. Bei Fragen zur Buchung und Buchungsmöglichkeiten bitte direkt über Airbnb kontaktieren.

The space
Die Wohnung besteht aus Bad mit Badewanne, Küche mit Essplatz für 4 Personen und einem Wohn- und Schlafraum mit Doppelbett und Schlafcouch.
In der Küche finden sie alle Utensilien für den täglichen Bedarf. Ausserdem verfügt sie über Kühlschrank, Mikrowelle, Spülmaschine, Waschmaschine, Kaffemaschine, Wasserkocher, Toaster und Herd.
Im Wohn- und Schlafraum haben sie einen Fernseher.

column4: GREAT PLACE IN THE HIPPEST LOCATION
column5:
Newly renovated 2 bedroom design apartment in one of the most upcoming and hippest area of Berlin!

The space
The flat is in a beginning of last century building that has been recently renovated so everything (except the design vintage furniture) is new, from bathroom & kitchen to bed linen and towels.
We have decorated this place with our favorite things , we love midcentury design and we hope you will feel immediately at home.
There are two spacious rooms, one bedroom with a big bed 160 x 200 and a living room with a sofa that transforms to a bed also 160 x 200 (with a real mattress, so it is a lot more comfortable than a normal sofa bed)

The kitchen is equipped with all you need for simple cooking, and of course clean towels and linen will be provided, there is also a washing machine with drying function in case you need it.

Mit viel Liebe zum Detail haben wir die Wohnung an der Berliner Stadtgrenze in direkter Nähe zu Potsdam eingerichtet. Die Küche hat einen einzigartigen Ausblick in den Garten, der gerne mit genutzt werden kann. Die Wohnung ist ideal für 3 Personen (eine 4. Person ist auf Wunsch möglich) und verfügt über ein Schlafzimmer (Doppelbett 160x200), Wohnzimmer (mit Schlafcouch), Eßzimmer, Bad (mit barrierefreier Dusche), einer großen Küche (mit Fußbodenheizung und Panoramfenster in den Garten) und WLAN.

The space
Unsere 73 qm große Gästeunterkunft wurde 2015 komplett renoviert und ist mit Möbeln und Accessoires im modernen als auch antiken Stil ausgestattet.
Wir sind ein familienfreundliches Haus. Kinder sind herzlich willkommen. Im Garten befindet sich ein großes Trampolin. Gerne können die Spielgeräte eigenverantwortlich genutzt werden. Eltern haften selbstverständlich für ihre Kinder.

Guest access
Die Gästeunterkunft befindet sich im Erdges

column4: Central, charming, quiet, bright flat with 4 rooms
column5:
This charming and bright 120 square meter flat with 4 rooms is located on the 4th floor (without elevator) of a classical Berlin building and can accommodate 5-6 people.

There is a large dining room with 6 chairs, a big sunny sleeping room with a big bed and an additional nice bed for a guest and a large wardrobe. Another second sleeping room has 3 possibilities to sleep.
The flat has a fully equipped kitchen with dish washer, a large bathroom and a washing machine, free WLAN, towels, linen.

The space
This charming and bright 120 square meter flat with 4 rooms is located on the 4th floor (without elevator) of a classical Berlin building and can accommodate 5-6 people.
The flat is also perfect for a family with two children, who are also welcome to the neighbors.

The comfortable living room has a cable TV and a comfortable sofa also converts to a double bed (1,60 m x 2,00 m).

The large dining room with 6 chairs, from whi

Perfect location for families: charming flat with 2 sunny balconies, modern equipment in northern Prenzlauer Berg. Stay with your family (2 adults and 2-3 kids) to discover Berlin and feel at home, enjoy garden and playground at the house.

The space
light & open space, quiet & green, cozy & modern, family-friendly & barrier-free: garden with sandbox, swing and terrace, 2 southfacing balconies, 2 bathrooms, 3 bedrooms, WLAN, close to public transport, shops and restaurants.

Guest access
Whole flat, washing-machine in basement, garden

License number
03/Z/AZ/005781-20

Our utterly charming 2-room apartment is situated in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg, the trendy district in Berlin. Kollwitzplatz, Prater, Mauerpark and Kulturbrauerei are in walking distance.

The space
The apartment is located in the heart of the popular district Prenzlauer Berg. Ever since the Berlin wall came down, a lively art & music scene has evolved here. The cultural offerings are thus varied and broad: Galleries, artists' cafés, theater, movies, bars, clubs, boutiques and restaurants, all within walking distance. Kollwitzplatz, Prater, Mauerpark and Kulturbrauerei are in walking distance. The GLS Sprachenzentrum (language school) on Kastanienallee is only a 2-minute walk away.
You need 1 minute to get to the tram. By tram you reach Oranienburger Straße, Hackescher Markt, Friedrichstraße or just another means of transport within only a few minutes. Sights worth visiting, such as Alexanderplatz, Museumsinsel, Nikolaiviertel, Unter den Linden, Friedrich

Big 1-Room Apartment in the Center of West Berlin. 2 Walking minutes to the next Metrostation. The Apartment has a free of charge Parkingspot. Very quite, cause the living/sleeping room is located not on the streetside. It´s very sunny!

The space
Located just 300 meters from the Fehrberliner Platz Metrostation. You Can walk in 13-15 minutes to the famous Kudamm. Very large living/sleeping room with a large windows. And you can use a free Parkingspot if you need ( just ask, and i will give you the special key)

Other things to note
You do not have to pay for babies from 0 - 24 month.
Check-in and Check-out time can be changed if needed. Just ask if you need something special.

This wonderful 2 bedroom apartment is located in the centre of Berlin. District Mitte is close to all great sights. You will be surrounded by sweet coffee shops, great restaurants and only steps away from Berlins famous flee market Mauerpark. Public transport is only 5 min walk away. Supermarket as well as sweet little restaurant Fräulein Dietrich serving great coffee and breakfast right across the street.

The space
This totally renovated apt. (April 2015) can host from 2 to 6 people. It has 2 bedrooms, one living room w/ sleeping couch, a new kitchen and bathroom. Enjoy! ;-)

Guest access
You will have access to cable TV and broad band internet.

Other things to note
We have renovated this apartment with lots of thought and lots of love. It is totally new. If there is anything missing or if you need anything - just let us know.

The space
The apartment is located on the 21st floor an offers a breathtaking view over the city of Berlin. It has got 2 bed rooms, living room, 2 bath rooms (shower and bath tub), kitchen, hallway, parquet flooring, elevator. Bed sheets and towels are included in the price. Furthermore, Dish washer, refrigerator, electric cooking range with oven, coffee machine, toaster, electric water jug, flatiron and ironing board, blow dryer, TV, Radio with CD-player, WLAN internet are all available.

The apartment is located in the historic city center of Berlin with a breathtaking view over Berlin. Most important sights can be visited within a few minutes by foot: Hackesche Höfe, Museumsinsel, State Opera, Alexanderplatz, Fernsehturm, Rotes Rathaus, Berliner Dom, Unter den Linden, German Historic Museum, Schlossplatz, Nikolaiviertel, Scheunenviertel, Synagoge. Gendarmenmarkt, Brandenburger Tor, Holocaust memorial, Potsdamer Platz, Jewish Museum are also within easy walking

The spacious and cosy 60 square-meters apartment is located in the heart of Wedding, a 7-minute walk from the subway station and surrounded with bakeries, restaurants and pubs in Berlin's newly thriving neighborhood.

The space
The 60 square meters apartment comprises one small room with a glass tile window and a big room that constitutes the living/bed/dining room. In addition to the comfortable double-bed, there's a very comfortable sofa, and a sofa bed in the guest room.

The apartment overlooks the beautiful inner courtyard, so you don't have to worry about street noises.

The bathroom has a big tub and the kitchen includes all the necessary items for your stay (oven/ electric water heater, toaster) as well as a dishwasher.

Guest access
Whole apartment is accesible to guests.

Nice Ground-Floor-Flat with a huge window (safety glass) and a private entrance to the street. You're right in the middle of the lovely Rixdorf-Kiez with nice cafes and bars. The public transport is nearby.(Bus 1min, S-Bahn/U-Bahn 5-10min) NEW WIFI!

The space
Nice Ground-Floor-Flat with a huge window (safety glass) and a private entrance to the street. You're right in the middle of the lovely Rixdorf-Kiez with nice cafes and bars. The public transport is nearby. (Busstop 1min, S-Bahn/U-Bahn 5-10min)

The apartment has a large window facing the street. You can feel the special Berlin spirit during the day. In the night the street is quiet and relaxed.
In addition, you can enjoy new and old art works. Since the apartment undergoes a transformation into a gallery space from time to time So… have fun with Berlin and art.

Guest access
Feel like home, everything available! If not, we will handle that!

Other things to

Optimal gelegene moderne 2 Zimmer Wohnung in Berlin-Prenzlauer Berg (für 2, 4 oder max 6 Person ); zu Fuß und mit Bahn alle bekannten Sehenswürdigkeiten Berlins zu erreichen.

The space
Zentral gelegene und modern ausgestattete 2 Zimmer (65m) Wohnung in Berlin-Prenzlauer Berg. 3 Gehminuten bis zum S-Bahn o. Straßenbahn. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten bis spät in die Nacht sind vorhanden. Mehrere Backshops laden zum gemütlichen Frühstück ein.
Mit einer gut eingerichteten Küche (Mikrowelle, Kaffeemaschine, Toaster, Wasserkocher u.v.m), mit einem großen Kühlschrank (mit extra Gefrierfach) , einer Spülmaschine und einem Induktionsherd, kann man jedoch auch selbst alles gut und bequem zubereiten.
Die Wohnung verfügt über ein gemütliches Wohn/Esszimmer mit Schlafsofa (für 2 Personen geeignet ) sowie über ein großes Schlafzimmer mit 1 Doppelbett (140 x 200) und 2 Einzelbetten(90 x 200). Also auch ideal für Familien mit 2-4 Kindern, oder 4 Erwachsenen und 2 Kind

Frisch kernsanierte, helle Wohnung im 2 OG mit kleinem Balkon in Süd-West-Ausrichtung in ruhiger Lage.
Ausstattung:
Küche mit Kühlschrank, Backofen/Herd, Abzug Haube und Spülmaschine. Kleiner Esstisch für zwei, Smart-TV, WLAN, Sofa, Bett 160x200

01/Z/RA/008355-18

3-Zimmer- Familie Apartment im typischen Berliner Altbau - sehr gute Verkehrsanbindung.
Alle drei Zimmer sind sehr groß.
1. Schlafzimmer mit einem Doppelbett.
1. Schlafzimmer mit einem Hochbett.
1. Wohnzimmer mit einem Schlafsofa.

The space
Unsere gemütliche Wohnung, in der wir jetzt zu viert wohnen (40,37, 6 und 4 Jahre Alt), liegt im 3. OG ist 91m² groß. Sie besteht aus 3 separate große Zimmer mit abgezogener Parkett und geräumige Küche und Badezimmer.

Ausstattung:
Küche:
Arbeitsplatz, Kühlschrank, Esstisch, Kinderstühl, Offen, Mikrowelle, Wasserkocher, Spühler, Michschäumer

Waschmaschine, Töpfchen

Viele Spielzeuge, Lego, Puzzel, Brettspiele, Schreibtisch, Bastellmaterielen

Unser überaus charmantes 2-Zimmer-Apartment befindet sich mitten im Herzen von Prenzlauer Berg und ist einer der beliebtesten Szenebezirke in Berlin. Das kulturelle Angebot ist vielfältig: Galerien, Künstlercafés, Theater, Kinos, Bars, Clubs, Boutiquen und Restaurants, alles zu Fuß erreichbar. Der Kollwitzplatz, der Prater, der Mauerpark, Helmholtzplatz und die Kulturbrauerei sind innerhalb weniger Gehminuten erreichbar.

The space
Unser elegantes 2-Zimmer-Apartment bietet Platz bis zu 6 Personen. Auf Anfrage können wir auch gern aufbetten und bis zu 7 Personen beherbergen. Das 1. Zimmer verfügt über folgende Ausstattung: 1 Ausziehbares Bett 160x200 m, 1 Einzelbett 90x200m, 1 Kommode, 1 Kleiderschrank, 1 Servierwagen, 1 Flat-TV.

Das 2.Zimmer bietet Platz für max. 4 Personen und ist wie folgt ausgestattet: 1 Doppelbett 180x200, 2 Einzelbetten 90x200, ein Sideboard, sowie 1 Flat-TV.

Guest access
Unsere Gäste haben das ganze Apartmen

Ich vermiete ein gemütliches Zimmer im Ortsteil Rudow am Ende einer Sackgasse. Küche, Esszimmer, Bad und Gästetoilette können mitbenutzt werden. Für eine dritte Person kann eine Schlafmöglichkeit bereitgestellt werden.

The space
Ruhig am Stadtrand gelegene Wohnung in einer Neubausiedlung am Ende einer Anliegerstraße.

Guest access
Die Terasse und der Garten können mitbenutzt werden.

Our 2 beroom-apartment is perfect for couples, friends or small families up to 5 persons. It's located in a central area of Berlin, 5 minutes to Goerlitzer Bahnhof, 10 minutes to Eastside Gallery and Ostbahnhof Station, perfect for sightseeing.
Please no group of friends wanting to party, we want to be clear about this, this is not a party apartment to be loud or listen to loud music. Is a very nice area and our building situation is quiet and peaceful, with very nice and respectful neighbours.

The space
Luminous, well connected, quiet apartment in the heart of Kreuzberg perfect for sightseeing and relax! We have 2 bedrooms (one with double bed 160x200; other with single bed 100x200) a living room with comfortable couch-bed (for 2 people) and dining table; kitchen and bathroom with shower

Other things to note
Our building consists of only 9 apartments in which we all are owners of our property, therefor we care and take care a lot of o
Nice and clean appartment

It is a cosy apartment at the kurfürstendamm right next to the Kadewe with direct acces to public transport, shopping and diversity in restaurant choices .There is a kitchen and a balkony in the apartment.

A beautiful apartment (110 m2) with elevator in Kollwitzstrasse, the prettiest street of Prenzlauer Berg - it doesn't get better!

Inside you find elegant decoration & comfort, high ceilings & space (+ fast wifi (100 Mb/s) + Netflix), outside the cafés and restaurants, cobble stones and parks and the famous market on Saturdays. I'm sure you'll love it, you'll have the perfect Berlin experience!

The space
Location, location, location! You can't beat the Kollwitzstrasse. It is spacious (110 m2), elegant and comfortable. And because it's an apartment where I really live when not in The Netherlands, it is not some impersonal rental, but fully equipped.

Guest access
BEDDING
There are two bedrooms. One with a -brand new!- large double, the other with two singles. There is a fifth bed, an real bed, but a bit smaller than a normal one (70 cm wide instead of 90 cm). Suitable for a child.
BATHROOM
The bathroom has a bath and

column4: Artist Jewel in hip neukölln near Tempelhofer Feld
column5:
Lovingly designed, exactly where you need to be in Berlin. Living as you know it from magazines. I will give you tips on how to get the best out of your Berlin Visit and the neighbourhood. My doors are open.

The space
My apartment is quiet, bright and has a cool, open floor plan. It has an open kitchen with access to the spacious living room and separate bedroom.
I've built my own bed, which sleeps 2 people.

The living room has a changeable seating arrangement which can serve as an extra bed for another guest.
Furthermore, I have a futon mattress which sleeps another 2 guests on a platform i build.

Clean linen, sheets and towels are provided and will be ready for you.
In total, more than enough room for 5 people.

I also have a stereo system which can be connected to your ipod if you want to listen to music.

I proudly do not own a TV. Life is the best movie you will ever watch.

Almost the e

Caringly decorated in the part of Berlin you want to be. Live like you know it from the magzines. My tips where to find the true gems of the city are invaluable. My door is open for you.

The space
This apartment is really quiet. From the kitchen there is a cool window to the bathroom, and all has just been remodelled. The bathroom has a tub. Through the hallway you acces the Bed/Livingroom which is spacious.
Nice finished woodfloors.

The bed sleeps 2 people. Space for one more is on the couch. In total 3 guests.

Clean linen, sheets and towels are provided and will be ready for you.
In total, more than enough room for 3 people.

I also have a retro Grundig stereo system which can be connected to your ipod if you want to listen to music.

I proudly do not own a TV. Life is the best movie you will ever watch.

Almost the entire furnishings are artist-made or consists of original and unique pieces from t

column4: Large flat - 105 sm - U+S Bahn West
column5:
Long Term Rental only (2 month +) - fully furnished and equipped. All costs included. Near U+S Bahn Westhafen.

Not suitable for 3 Singles. Good for 2 people sharing or a small family.

Stadtleben pur im Prenzlauer Berg. Fußläufig ins szenige Treiben, super Anbindung an U- und S-Bahn und trotzdem Oase für die kleine Familie.

The space
Wir vermieten eine 130qm-grosse Wohnung, perfekt für eine kleine Familie, gern auch mit zwei Kindern. Es gibt zwei Wohnzimmer, ein Schlafzimmer und ein Kinderzimmer mit grossem Bett, also auch für zwei geeignet, eine Küche und ein Bad mit Badewanne.

Guest access
Die Wohnung kann komplett genutzt werden, wir haben eine gut ausgestattete Küche, W-LAN und Balkon.

Other things to note
Mindestaufenthalt 1 Woche

The space
Die Wohnung verfügt über ein Wannenbad, eine Küche mit Herd, Waschmaschine, Spülmaschine und großem Kühlschrank, ein Schlafzimmer mit Doppelbett und ein geräumiges Wohnzimmer mit großem Esstisch und Couch.
Eingerichtet mit antiken Möbeln, es stehen Ihnen zwei Fernseher mit DVD - Player zur Verfügung sowie kostenloses WLAN.

Ob für einen Wochenendausflug
oder einen längeren Aufenthalt, wir sind sicher, Sie werden sich bei uns wohl
fühlen und wünschen Ihnen viel Freude dabei Berlin zu entdecken.

Die Nachbarschaft

Die Lage mitten im Schöneberger Kiez ermöglicht es den berühmten Kürfürstendamm und den wohl
schönsten Markt Berlins, den Winterfeld Markt in nur wenigen Gehminuten zu
erreichen. Cafés, Bars, Clubs und Restaurants befinden sich selbstverständlich
auch in unmittelbarer Nähe.

It is a quiet 2-room apartment (66m²) for max. 4+2 people.
The apartment is located in a typical Berliner “Gründerzeit”-house from 1873 and offers a large kitchen, a bathroom with a shower and two rooms with loft beds.
The friendly holiday apartment overlooks the house-owned garden, which can be entered from the same courtyard that also leads to the flat.
Only a few minutes away is the underground station Mehringdamm (U6, U7) and a bus station of the M19 line.

You find us in the middle of Berlin, in the lively and diverse Kreuzberg.

The flat is surrounded by green (tempelhofer feld at 100m), in the beloved and popular Schillerkiez. Open view with children's and football's playground. Very calm at night and 1st part of the morning, the animation raises during the day!

The space
It's my flat, and I managed to keep it very minimal: no chairs (you'll certainly eat outside, or like I do, on the floor with the plants).
Better for 2 persons, but I let the possibility to be 4 people, since the sofa is also a double bed.

Das neue kleines Haus bietet Ihnen Ruhe im Garten, und trotzdem nur 20 min zum Berliner Zentrum. Sowie 15 min zum Airport Schönefeld.  Öffentlicher Nahverkehr ist lediglich 3 min zu Fuß entfernt.  Sie haben auch die Möglichkeit bei uns zu parken. Wir werden ihren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich gestalten.

column4: Make yourself at home in Berlin
column5:
I am renting a stylish old apartment (85 sqm) in central Prenzlauer Berg, near Kollwitzplatz, 3 bedrooms, bath, kitchen. Wi-Fi available. Excellent connection to public transport.

License number
03/Z/ZA/002664-17

Located in the university area of WEDDING, this cosy and coloured apartment is easily reachable by the purple tube line (U6) or the orange line (U9), respectively at LEOPOLD PLATZ or AMRUMER STRASSE, and it is 5 stops far away from ZOOLOGISHER GART.

column4: House in Spandau for 6 to relax
column5:
Full 80m² cottage
500m² garden, grill spot
2 bedrooms (2 /4 beds), 1 living room +TV, 1 bathroom +1 toilet, 1 kitchen dishwasher, washing machine, stove
Parking on property, quiet area, close by: Playing ground, lake, sports ground, bus stop -600m

The space
Since parks and a lake are close by, traveling with kids, pets or by bicycle would make your trip even better!

Guest access
You will have full access to the entire property except for the basement (which is mostly used for storage and heating adjustments), and the small house in the backyard which is still being renovated.

Other things to note

Das Hausboot ist 12 Meter lang und mit allem ausgestattet, was man für erholsame Ferien braucht.
Dieses Hausboot ist mit zwei 7,5 PS-Motoren ausgestattet, mit 15 PS fahren Sie führerscheinfrei. Da das Steuern eines Hausbootes zu vergleichen ist mit der Fahrt mit einem LKW, ist eine eingehende Ein-/Unterweisung dennoch notwendig, diese kann je nach Vorerfahrung/Dauer kostenpflichtig (EUR 60,--) sein.

The space
Auf dem Wasser hat die Zeit eine andere Qualität :-)

Bitte fordern Sie sich meine umfangreiche Inventarliste an (kann nur per Mail versendet werden)

column4: Central cozy flat close to Kreuzberg & Mitte

The flat is in a very nice and popular area of Berlin, central Friedrichshain.
Close to Mitte & Kreuzberg. Metro, Bus and Train close by. (Frankfurter Tor)
It got a lot of nice & cosy cafes, bars and restaurants around the corner

The space
Come enjoy our beautiful and cosy apartment.
We travel a lot and we like to bring things from our trips around the world and decorate our home. You will find a lot of plants, carpets. A dreamcatcher from Mexico. Blankets and pillows from the United States and a lot of Scandinavien porcelan.

We do everything we can to take care of the planet and our environment. We are happy if you want to participate. Please turn of all lights when you leave the flat. We try not to waste food, so please feel free to eat our fresh food and to leave your food behind. We recycle all (clean and hard) plastic and paper and we always bring down bottles, so feel free to leave it behind.

column5:
Was macht den Teil eines EFH so besonders? Es ist das obere Stockwerk in einem EFH in Heiligensee (am Rande Berlins). Die langsam gewachsene Bauweise des Hauses von 1930 bis heute macht es einzigartig... (rd. 65qm)
Ich wohne im unteren Bereich.

The space
Das Obergeschoß ist gut ausgestattet und frisch renoviert. WLAN steht zur Verfügung, Bettwäsche, Handtücher und Fön ebenso. Bei Bedarf können Fahrräder ausgeliehen werden!
Da ich auch im Haus wohne, bin ich immer erreichbar und kann bei Bedarf helfen.
Wir haben einen gemeinsamen Eingang. Die Bauweise ist aber so, dass beide Bereiche gut getrennt sind, aber es ist keine abgetrennt separate Wohnung. Es kann sein, dass ich aus versorgungstechnischen Gründen (Warmwasserversorgung) auf den Dachboden muss. Das Haus is

In our cosy flat in the last floor we have place for 4-6 persons,it is quiete and 5 min away from Mauerpark,Kastanienallee & the government part!Really nice is Arkonaplace with a weekly market & bars

You have easily access to metro,tram & bus!

Our beautiful very central studios for 1 to 4 people (in three different layouts) are situated right on the border between Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg, only a short walk from the TV tower. Our studios are very comfortable for 2 people. However, there is space for up to 2 additional people on a sofa bed. Our studios are all situated in a typical Berlin building form the beginning of the 20th century. We offer studios on the 1st to the 4th floor (no lift).

The space
Our compact studios are a good alternative for the Berlin trip, where you prefer to explore the city. In a cozy living room there are 2 single beds that can be combined to form a double bed. We are also happy to prepare the sofa bed for 2 additional people. In the room there is also a dining table with chairs, storage space for personal belongings and a TV. There is a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom with a shower. Please note that the pictures show all our studio types. The Studio you will get depen

Newly remodeled top located luxury apartment with 4 rooms stretching over 2 floors. 120 square meters of space equipped with new high end quality designer furniture and 2 balconies. Located in the middle of the most vibrating Simon-Dach-Strasse.

The space
Most centrally located at Berlins highest concentration of bars, food and nightlife. And yet a quiet sleep facing the second backyard. The apartment is facing west with a view to trees spread over multiple backyards.
Your visit to bars, restaurants, shops and nightlife starts directly in the block. Good public transportation. Better location in Berlin is impossible.

2 bedrooms

2 balconies facing west

column4: Very spacious room with own bath and kitchen
column5:
Completely furnished bedroom with french balcony near Landwehrkanal/Treptower Park. You have an own bath and an own kitchen with all in. Because of the double-bed and an additional mattress there can sleep 3 persons.
The street is very quiet, but central. The apartment is in the 3. floor.

Eine geräumige 2-Zimmer Wohnung im Herzen Neukölln mit guter Anbindung. Die Unterkunft ist geeignet für max. 4 Personen. Im Schlafzimmer befindet sich ein Doppelbett für 2 Personen. Für 2 weitere Personen gibt es das große Schlafsofa im Wohnzimmer. Die Küche ist mit allem ausgestattet. Im Badezimmer gibt es eine Badewanne sowie Duschmöglichkeit. WiFi ist natürlich auch vorhanden.
S&U-Bahn in der Nähe sowie Busstation vor der Haustür. Einkaufs- und Essensmöglichkeiten an jeder Ecke.

The space
Renting out a quiet, cozy room located in central of Neukoelnn. It has a bedroom with a double bed for 2 persons, in the living room there is a big couch for another 2 persons. The apartment also counts a nice kitchen and a bathroom with bathtub.
Bars, restaurants, parks and shops are reachable within walking distance.

In our coloured flat a bath, kitchen, as well as a spacious room is available to you. 2 people could sleep in the bed and a third would have place on a big couch. Feel like at home in our small empire :-)

The space
In our coloured flatshare a bath, kitchen, as well as a spacious room is available to you. 2 people could sleep in the bed and a third would have place on a big couch. Feel you like at home in our small empire :-)
Listen to music, laugh out loud, cook and feel everytime like at home and enjoy your vacation!!

Guest access
You share bathroom and kitchen with us (2Girls) and the room in the front part of the flat is all yours

Accogliente appartamento in centro,a sole 4 fermate di metro dalla principale via dello shopping Kurfürstendamm .Emdener strasse è facilmente raggiungibile da Tegel circa 10 min con il bus TXL. Zona carina tranquilla con ristoranti e supermarket vicini
U-Bahn e S-Bahn distano pochi min dall'appartamento .

C'è un letto matrimoniale è un divano letto.
All'interno troverete ,connessione Internet,lettore dvd,lavatrice lavastoviglie,piano ad induzione,bollitore,forno tradizionale,forno a microonde,macchina per caffè,pentole ,posate ,tovaglia,biancheria letto,asciugamani,ferro ed asse da stiro e phon.

The cozy flat(52m²) is located on the biggest street in Berlin, but is completely quiet because of special windows. 3min away from the subway U12. The high ceiling and big kitchen create a special atmosphere.

The apartment has enough place for four people, because the sofa is transformable into a bed. There are fresh towels and bed sheets. The bathroom is very modern. column4: Center Design near of museums galleries quiet!!
column5:
Wonderful bright apartment with high-class designer furniture. The perfect place to explore Berlin or relax after a long working day.The apartment is located in Berlin Mitte . From here it's just a short walk to Berlin's main cultural attractions.

The space
The spacious living room has a dining space with a huge dining and working table that sits up to ten persons. Also an ergonomic office chair belongs to the table.
As the ceilings are 4 meters high and windows are huge, it creats a loft feeling.

From the kitchen and bedroom, you can access to the wooden balcony.
The living room is equipped with a cosy huge sofabed that includes a 160x200 king size sleeping sofa.

Also a flatscreen TV (47 inch) and DVD exists in the flat.
The kitchen is equipped with everything you need to cook. Also find a washing machine. You have a huge garden, where you can sit or do barbecue.

The sleeping room is with a 160x200 double bed and a

Cosy quiet and equipped apartment directly next to the Marheinke market and Bergmann Street famous for its Cafes and second hand shops. Just below the apt. is the U-Bahn station Gneisenau that will connect you everywhere.

column4: Private room in design flat in PrenzlauerBerg
column5:
Pictures are worth a 1000 words. Apart from its inner comfort you will be feeling so relaxed surrounded by the greenery, yet in the center of east Berlin. I’m sure you will enjoy your stay.

The space
The large room provided can sleep up to five guests. Thanks to its furniture and equipment, the flat provides you a range of possibilities: from organising good dinners and cocktail drinks between friends, to watching a TV series on Netflix or a movie with 3D glasses, to having your own workingspace or even doing a bit of sport. Heating is great and will provide a warm and cozy place to return to after exploring Berlin. Bed Mattresses are very comfortable and a large wardrobe is provided for use in the guest room.

Guest access
You will have access to everything except to my room. There is a playground for kids in the garden accessible for everyone living in the complex.

column5:
Owner on vacation. Design apartment available during this period in heart of city across Badeschiff. Please enquire for further information.

Check out our new design home in Budapest! https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/13673696

The space
This large 87sqm Designer 3 room apartment (1 Double Bedroom, 1 Living Room with Single Sofa-bed, 1 Dining/Work Space) is newly renovated and creatively decorated into its very accurate detail. The apartment’s pristine originally-restored wooden floors and parquet, featured throughout, are enhanced by its high ceilings. The interior is made authentic through its eclectic and tasteful décor by Interior Stylist, featuring vintage design classics combined with modern furnitures f.e Mirror Ball lamp from "Fontana Arte" or a "Panton wire stool".

Next to the spacious LIVING ROOM you`ll enter through large restored french doors, a big DINING area or CREATIVE WORK SPACE where you also can step out to one of the balcony`

Eine kleine, voll eingerichtete - Zimmer Wohnung im Herzen Berlins. Voll ausgestattet. Direkter Zugang zu U8/U2 und S-Bahn. 5 Minuten Fussweg zum Alex und angesagten Clubs.

The space
Voll ausgestattete 2-Zimmer Wohnung mit Schlafzimmer (Doppelbett, TV und Schrank), Wohnzimmer mit Schlafcouch, TV und Essbereich. Im Flur befindet sich ein Schreibtisch, perfekt fürs Arbeiten. Auch die Küche ist mit Herd, Backofen, Kühl-und Gefrierschrank voll ausgestattet. Töpfe, Teller etc. sind vorhanden. Das Badezimmer ist mit einer Badewanne ausgestattet. Auch ein Haartrockner sowie frische Handtücher liegen bereit.

Other things to note

column4: The TUCHOLSKY Loft: Luxus in MITTE!
column5:
Welcome in the very heart of Berlin Mitte! In this loft, your holiday dreams will come true! A design jewel for up to 4 persons. Enjoy!

The space
Welcome in the very heart of Berlin Mitte!

This apartment will make your holiday dreams come true!
It is 65 sqm big and luxurious equipped, decorated in a fine Art Deco style. It has been fully new constructed, renovated and decorated in November 2015 with design items and furniture from Kartell, Philippe Starck, Villeroy&Boch, Slamp, etc. You will be thrilled!

One large living room (around 45 sqm) with an opened, modern kitchen, dining place, sofa and couch corner with a smart-TV including fast Internet Access, hi-fi, DVD and Blue-Ray player.

One large sofa bed for two persons (150 cm bright) in the best quality (real bed mattress).

One bedroom (around 15 sqm) with a large box-spring bed like in the best hotels (180 cm bright).

A luxury bathroom with a huge

Beautiful old Berliner apartment, very bright and spacious, incl. private bathroom. Also has its own entrance door to the flat.

On request there is an extra single-mattress to be arranged.

column4: Small room for 4 in artsy Friedrichshain
column5:
Stay in the heart of Berlin! Our veggie flat is on the top floors (no lift, sorry!), looking into a quiet green backyard. The top floor offers a big living room/kitchen and terrace. Stairs lead to the lower floor with the bed rooms (including your room) and the spacious bathroom.

The space
We moved to Berlin recently. The apartment is cozy and colorful, but still a bit work in progress, so hopefully you don't mind a bit of chaos. Think boxes full of books in the corner :-)

Your bedroom is very small. It's OK for 4 persons, but only if you want to use it just to sleep. Which is exactly what most of our visitors want: The city offers so much to discover, and the flat is cozy and charming, with a nice view into the green backyard (squirrels often come by for a visit).
The room sleeps 4: two in a shared bed, and two on a double mattress in a cave-like elevated surface just below the ceiling, which you reach by climbing a ladder.

Guest a

Perfect location right at the Landwehr-canal in the heart of Kreuzberg and Neukoelln. Two of the most exciting neighborhoods in Berlin, it's the ideal place to get the best of both worlds. 2,5 room apt, small balcony, nice kitchen, 1,60m double bed.

The space
Wir vermieten unsere schoene, helle 2,5 Zimmer Altbauwohnung in perfekter Lage direkt am Landwehrkanal. Die Wohnung befindet sich im 3. Stock und ist wenige Schritte vom idyllischen Paul-Lincke-Ufer und der schoenen Thielenbruecke entfernt, welche Kreuzberg und Neukoelln miteinander verbindet.

Apartment:

+ Grosses Schlaf- und Wohnzimmer
+ Durchgangszimmer (Studioraum)

column4: Spacious Bohemian Apartment facing Viktoria Park
column5:
Big and Charming Apartment in Alte-Bau style (Old School). The flat is facing the amazing Viktoria park. 3 big double sleeping rooms. Really big and bright living room with a balcony, full equipped kitchen, 2 bathrooms. The place is perfect for big families , groups of friends and couples who want to live a real Berlin experience.

The space
The flat is fully equipped, really big spaces and nice huge living room as sharing space. You will feel in a typical old school Berlin flat with a touch of ethnic taste.
A Big maroccan door is the central piece of the big living room, many spotlight and candles they make the space really cosy at night.

Guest access
The guests can use all the rooms and enjoy the place like they own one.

Other things to note
The atmosfere of the appartment is really the tipical Berlin old school style mixed with a bohemien and romantic touch.

License number
02/Z/RA/008273

The space
Auf ca 40qm bieten wir ein großzügiges Apartment mit King Size Bett (180x200) und vielfältigem Stauraum. Im Wohnbereich findet bei Bedarf eine weitere Person bequem auf der Schlafcouch (130x190) Platz.Das Doppelbett befindet sich auf einem Podest, das über eine Raumspartreppe zu erreichen ist. Im Sommer ist der Balkon mit Gartenmöbeln ausgestattet, die zum Verweilen einladen. Die Einrichtung wie auch das Apartment befinden sich in gepflegtem Zustand. Die Wohnung hat sehr gute Verkehrsanbindungen. Die Innenstadt ist bequem per S-Bahn oder Bus zu erreichen. The flat is on the ground floor of the garden house of a well-kept traditional Berliner Building/”Altbau”. It has a practical layout, where the big windows and the high ceilings create a very pleasant “Altbau Ambiente.” All 3 rooms face on to the quiet “Hinterhaus”-garden.There is a parquet floor in the last 2 rooms, with a tiled floor in the entrance. The entrance has an open wardrobe and a closet. First th entrance room, then a middle doom with sofa bed and a bedroom behind,

The flat is fully furnished, from bedding to salt shakers!
The bathroom has a shower and washing machine. The kitchen is equipped with an electric stove and microwave, and
provides for all cooking utensils, crockery and glasses etc.
The entrance has an open wardrobe and a closet. The entrance room contains a dining table, a couch and a closet for dishes and one for cloth. The living room has a TV, a sofa bed, chairs and a closet.

Willkommen in unserer modernen, familienfreundlichen und eleganten Ferienwohnung! Es ist ein sehr ruhiges, komplett möbliertes, 75 qm großes Appartement im 1. OG einer Wohnanlage. In der Nachbarschaft ist der Müggelsee. Zum Zentrum ist es nicht weit gelegen (ca 15 km) mit guter Verkehrsanbindung (Tram ist 2 min entfernt). Die Schlüsselübergabe und Kassierung (Energie und city tax) bitte vorher absprechen. Veränderte check-in oder check-out-Zeiten sind kostenpflichtig (25€).

The space
Die Wohnung liegt im 1. Stockwerk einer ruhigen, 3-geschossigen Wohnanlage in der Nähe von Wald, Wasser und S- Bahn unweit des Müggelsees. The space
Situated in the very heart of the most beloved and looked-for Berlin neighbourhood «Prenzlauerberg» our large apartment is the ideal home base for exploring the Berlin's city and it's nightlife. You'll find all kind of bars, restaurants, clubs and shops for practically every need be it vegan food or leather straps.
Our apartment in Schliemannstraße is just a few steps from famous «Helmholtzplatz» which is a vivid center of Prenzlauer Berg where Restaurants and shops line up around the open space three blocks wide and one block high thus forming a green park that is very popular not only to residents.
An Edeka supermarkt is open from 7 a.m. to 7 p.m. just at the next corner

The space
The stylish Berlin's Charlottenburg-Wilmersdorf district offers modern apartments right on the shopping street . The apartments at Emperio Apart Kurfürstendamm offer free internet access (WLAN ) and a fully equipped kitchen .
The Emperio Apart Kurfürstendamm has modern décor and laminate floors . All apartments are equipped with 2x flat-screen TV , a bathroom with shower .
The Adenauerplatz is 600 meters from the Emperio Apart Kurfürstendamm . Regular buses run to the main attractions in west Berlin . These include the Berlin Zoo , the Memorial Church and the world-famous KaDeWe store .

Fully renovated sunny flat in the heart of Berlin (Mitte/Prenzlauerberg). Absolutely cosy environment on the last floor in a beautiful building. Well communicated (Ubahn, Tram, bus services), full of sun, in one of the most trendy areas of the city.

The space
Colorful stylish two floor maisonette (bedroom upstairs) with high ceilings in the heart of Berlin (Mitte/Prenzlauerberg). The flat is on the 4th and last floor, in a neo-classical fully renovated building. It was decorated in an incredibly warm and cosy decoration fool of pleasant harmonic color combinations. The building has a beautiful traditional Berlin architecture (high curved ceilings) and is around various bars, cafés, restaurants, supermarkets and parks.

column4: Schönes Zimmer - Nähe Schönefeld und BER
column5:

The space

The flat is small (40m2), but bright and convenient. It has got big windows overlooking a huge courtyard with a big tree right in front of the bedroom window. In the summer time, you will hear birds more often then a car – or a fire horn. In the very centre of Berlin. The flat suits a couple best. But it is also cool for a family with two kids, who can use the sofa bed in the living room. (Our family does so with a lot of fun). There is a small kitchen, that could be used to cook. But to us it is more fun to dinner in one of the beautiful restaurants nearby. No pets please.

You can use everything in the flat. There is a washing mashine, a bathtub and a dishwasher.

Leben wie ein Berliner auf ca. 200 m²/ 2 Etagen im grüne Frohnau, dem beliebtesten Stadtteil im Norden Berlins. The space
